description:
I know I'm late to the topic but we're here now, Manjaro Linux is testing out a telemetry system. Once again we need to do this thing where I explain why opt-out telemetry is not acceptable and never will be acceptable especially on Linux.

title: The Manjaro Linux Telemetry Situation
